C

cleanup() - Method in class eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context
Saves the context to a file and removes its data memory and it from the dynamic serializer (so that universal save does not save it anymore)
cleanup() - Method in class eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.ContextualEgoNetwork
Applies Context.cleanup() to all contexts.
clearSerializers() - Static method in class eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Serializer
This function removes all serializers from memory.
Context - Class in eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork
This class implements a context of the Contextual Ego Network.
ContextualEgoNetwork - Class in eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork
This class implements a Contextual Ego Network, which is the conceptual model of our Heterogeneous Social Graph.
ContextualEgoNetworkListener - Interface in eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork
An interface of listeners that can be added on a ContextualEgoNetwork to listen to structural changes.
createNetworkWithRecovery() - Static method in class eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.examples.ExampleRecovery
 
createOrLoad(Storage, String, Object) - Static method in class eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.ContextualEgoNetwork
Instantiates a ContextualEgoNetwork at the given storage path by creating a new ego node with the given data.
createOrLoad(String, String, Object) - Static method in class eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.ContextualEgoNetwork
Deprecated.
Prefer ContextualEgoNetwork.createOrLoad(Storage, String, Object), which this method wraps. This method remains only to ensure compatibility with previous versions and may be removed in future versions.
CreationListener - Class in eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.listeners
This class implements a ContextualEgoNetworkListener that assigns node, context and edge timestamps.
CreationListener() - Constructor for class eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.listeners.CreationListener
 
CreationListener.CreationTimestamp - Class in eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.listeners
 
CreationTimestamp() - Constructor for class eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.listeners.CreationListener.CreationTimestamp
 
CrossModuleComponent - Class in eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork
This is a base class used by HELIOS components, such as Node and Edge that need to store data coming from multiple modules.
